committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code with respect to the observance of Memorial Day and Veteran's Day.

summary.text: Designates May 30 as Memorial Day and November 11 as Veterans Day.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code with respect to the observance of Memorial Day and Veteran's Day.
